channel.title: HOME on Clojure Mini Applications Step by Step
channel.description: Recent content in HOME on Clojure Mini Applications Step by Step

item.description: My blog HOME Dit is de home van mijn blog ! SQL Inspector : Clojure + JDBC + JavaFX Desktop application What? “SQL Inspector” is a desktop application written in Clojure. It shows all tables of a database. There is a textbox that you can use to filter the tables. Selecting a table will show all its columns and types. Technology I’ll use the clojure libraries cljfx and next-jdbc Step 01 - Database connection You need to download JavaFX from Gluon.

item.title: SQL Inspector : Clojure + JDBC + JavaFX Desktop application
item.description: This mini application is called “SQL Inspector”. It is a desktop JavaFX application that connects to a database via JDBC. All tables of that database are shown. You can apply a filter if you wish. Selecting a table will show all its columns and types. I’ll use the clojure libraries cljfx and next-jdbc Prerequisites You need to download JavaFX from Gluon. At the moment of writen version 17.0.2 is the version with Long Term Suppport.
